content:
Configure Payment Actions Based on Claim Payment Status

Use a flexible framework to provide financial actions to claims adjusters. The framework supports standard and custom financial workflows based on claim payment status.

Configure Pay, Edit, and Delete Payment Actions
Configure your org with custom settings for Pay, Edit, and Delete payment actions.

Configure the Cancel Payment Action
Configure your org with custom settings and an integration procedure to support canceling payments.

Configure Custom Payment Actions
Configure custom actions that invoke front- and back-end processes when users click specific payment actions.

Configure the Request Ex Gratia Payment Action
Configure a Request Ex Gratia payment action to streamline ex gratia payments, invoking an approval process and changing payment status.

Download and Import Vlocity Actions DataPack for Payment Actions
Get a head-start configuring custom payment actions that invoke front- and back-end processes.
title: Configuring Payment Actions for Insurance Claims
